title: Is hate speech acceptable in chat or not I’m confused.
body:
I reported the player and riot did NOTHING I have been checking opgg to see if he got banned, he has been playing everyday for the past 10 days. 
I took screenshots cuz I know riot is a piece of shit company. I got 2 accounts banned, and rightfully so I used to be very toxic, but I never resorted to racial slurs. I play with my chat disabled in game and this year I hit honor 3 for the 1st time ever. 
 
So are racial slurs bannable or not? I thought they were.
 
[removed by moderation]

replies.body:
No, it’s not acceptable. So is calling another player “cancer,” even if they’re reprehensible. 

I’ve removed the images you posted as naming and shaming are not allowed in the boards. 

If you have any questions about this moderation action, don't hesitate to reach out to the Boards Moderation Team via:

* The [**NA Boards Discord**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification)
* The [**Discuss the Boards**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) sub-board
